ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS-C SCM Search Coil Magnetometer Level-2 (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description:
This dataset contains calibrated THEMIS-C SCM (Search Coil Magnetometer) magnetic field in FAST SURVEY, PARTICLE BURST and WAVE BURST modes.
The time resolutions are:
FAST SURVEY (SCF): 1/8 s.
PARTICLE BURST (SCP): 1/128 s (only short bursts of data).
WAVE BURST (SCW): 1/8192 s (only short bursts of data).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Fast-Survey Magnetic Field Magnitude
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C Total B-field magnitude from SCF data (fast-survey, 1/8 sec time resolution).

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Fast-Survey Magnetic Field Vector (GSE)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from fast survey mode (1/8 sec time resolution) in GSE Coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Fast-Survey Magnetic Field Vector (GSM)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from fast survey mode (1/8 sec time resolution) in GSM Coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Fast-Survey Magnetic Field Vector (DSL)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from fast survey mode (1/8 sec time resolution) in DSL (despun spacecraft) coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Particle-Burst Magnetic Field Magnitude
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C Total B-Field magnitude from SCP data(particle burst, 1/128 second time resolution)

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Particle-Burst Magnetic Field Vector (GSE)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from particle burst mode (1/128 second time resolution) in GSE coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Particle-Burst Magnetic Field Vector (GSM)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from particle burst mode (1/128 second time resolution) in GSM coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Particle-Burst Magnetic Field Vector (DSL)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from particle burst mode (1/128 second time resolution) in DSL (despun spacecraft) coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Wave-Burst Magnetic field Magnitude

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Wave-Burst Magnetic Field Vector (GSE)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from wave burst mode(1/8192 second time resolution) in GSE coordinates.

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Wave-Burst Magnetic Field Vector (GSM)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from wave burst mode(1/8192 second time resolution) in GSM coordinates

Parameter.Name: THEMIS-C SCM Wave-Burst Magnetic Field Vector (DSL)
Parameter.Description: THEMIS-C B-Field vector from wave burst mode(1/8192 second time resolution) in DSL (despun spacecraft) coordinates.
